alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:47AM MST until January 18 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS BEEN ISSUED FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 2 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft
